mapper.insert: insert into fault_report(user_id, pile_id, fault_type, description, images) values (#{userId}, #{pileId}, #{faultType}, #{description}, #{images})
mapper.select: select fr.id, fr.fault_type, fr.description, fr.images AS imagesJson, fr.status, fr.create_time, fr.update_time, cp.pile_no, u.nickname, u.phone from fault_report AS fr join charging_pile AS cp on fr.pile_id = cp.id join user AS u on fr.user_id = u.id where user_id = #{userId} order by fr.id desc
